The X-Force Viveza 2 serial generator requires a Installation ID number.

There's nothing in either of the two RTF's indicating what this number should be.

Where is this number found?
I too need the installation ID number in order to get the serial number for Viveza 2.  Has anyone been successful with this?
Many thanks chuckie6, all plug-ins works very well!

LiaFlia, You get the ID number of you click on activate by phone. type the ID number in the key generator and then you generate the nessery key for activation of Viveza 2.

Good Luck!

People: you must actually click on the 'activate by phone' to get the installation ID. Pop that number into the keygen - viola!!
